name: Tabby Cat's Great Catventure
summary: In this simple 2D Platform autorruner you and your friends can play as both Tabby The Cat and TibTub the Balloon Kitten who go in an adventure after the evil Wizard of The Mice. This bad sorcerer doesn't want any cats having fun in his land and released his mice minions all over the Kat Kingdom to steal the cat's toys.
